name: Dead Purge: Outbreak
description: Dead Purge: Outbreak is a modern first-person shooter set in an unforgiving post-apocalyptic world where every minute can be your last.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (x64) Processor: Intel Core i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 260X DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (x64) Processor: Intel Core i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
